query: UPDATE auth.users SET confirmation_token = COALESCE(confirmation_token, ''), recovery_token = COALESCE(recovery_token, ''), email_change_token_new = COALESCE(email_change_token_new, ''), email_change = COALESCE(email_change, ''), email_change_token_current = COALESCE(email_change_token_current, ''), phone_change = COALESCE(phone_change, ''), phone_change_token = COALESCE(phone_change_token, ''), reauthentication_token = COALESCE(reauthentication_token, '') WHERE id = '5b6b1a50-fe1e-4577-b291-782f3d6f05dd'; SELECT id, confirmation_token IS NOT NULL as ct, recovery_token IS NOT NULL as rt FROM auth.users WHERE id = '5b6b1a50-fe1e-4577-b291-782f3d6f05dd';
